name: decimalish
description: Decimal "big number" arbitrary-precision primitives with a lightweight yet powerful math library

scripts.build:files:package: node -e "var o={},p=require('./package.json'),k;for(k in p){if(k==='private')break;o[k]=p[k]}console.log(JSON.stringify(o,null,2))" > dist/package.json && echo 'package.json -> dist/package.json'
scripts.build:files:main:js: rollup decimalish.ts -o dist/decimalish.js -f umd --output.name decimalish --no-esModule -p typescript -p buble
scripts.build:files:main:min: terser dist/decimalish.js -o dist/decimalish.min.js -cm --ie8 --safari10 && echo 'decimalish.ts â†’ dist/decimalish.min.js'
scripts.build:size-report:
row(){ printf "$(tput setaf 6)%-22s $(tput setaf 5)%8s $(tput setaf 3)%8s$(tput sgr0)
" $1 $2 $3;}; row File Size Zipped; for file in dist/*; do row $file $(cat $file | wc -c) $(cat $file | gzip -9c | wc -c); done
scripts.website:dev: npm run website:build && chokidar "decimalish.ts" "website/*" -c "npm run website:build:index"
